required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Assessment of EyeArt Performance With Retinal Imaging Devices
clinical_study.official_title: Assessment of EyeArt Performance With Retinal Imaging Devices

brief_summary.textblock: The study evaluates the performance of the EyeArt system for detecting diabetic retinopathy from images captured using multiple retinal imaging devices and operators.

intervention.description: Subjects will undergo fundus photography before and/or after administration of mydriatic agent
Subjects may be administered mydriatic medication to dilate their pupils.

study_pop.textblock: Study subjects will be enrolled at primary care and/or eye care centers
